jcr:content.jcr:title: United States Senate Appropriations Subcommittee on Homeland Security

contentheadline.headline: United States Senate Appropriations Subcommittee on Homeland Security

contentrichtext.text: '''U.S. Senate Appropriations Subcommittee on Homeland Security''' is one of twelve subcommittees of the [[U.S. Senate Committee on Appropriations]]. It was formally established in 2003 in response to the [[terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001]] to oversee national security programs and the newly created [[United States Department of Homeland Security|Department of Homeland Security]]. ==Jurisdiction== The subcommittee is responsible for the Department of Homeland Security and its related agencies, including the [[Federal Emergency Management Agency]], the [[Transportation Security Administration]], [[U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement]], [[U.S. Customs and Border Protection]], [[U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services]], the [[United States Secret Service|U.S. Secret Service]], and the [[United States Coast Guard]]. The subcommittee also provides funding for state and local preparedness efforts. ==Members, 113th Congress== The Committee is currently chaired by [[United States Democratic Party|Democrat]] [[Mary Landrieu]] of [[Louisiana]], and the [[Ranking member|Ranking Minority Member]] is [[United States Republican Party|Republican]] [[Dan Coats]] of [[Indiana]]. {| class=wikitable ! Majority ! Minority |- | {{party shading/Democratic}} valign=top | *[[Mary Landrieu]], Louisiana, ''Chairman'' *[[Patrick Leahy]], Vermont *[[Patty Murray]], Washington *[[Jon Tester]], Montana *[[Mark Begich]], Alaska | {{party shading/Republican}} valign=top | *[[Dan Coats]], Indiana, ''Ranking Member'' *[[Thad Cochran]], Mississippi *[[Richard Shelby]], Alabama *[[Lisa Murkowski]], Alaska *[[Jerry Moran]], Kansas |- | colspan=2 align=center | ''[[Ex officio]]'' |- | {{party shading/Democratic}} valign=top | *[[Barbara Mikulski]], Maryland | {{party shading/Republican}} valign=top | |} ==See also== * [[United States House Appropriations Subcommittee on Homeland Security]] ==External links== *[http://appropriations.senate.gov/homelandsecurity.cfm U.S. Senate Appropriations Subcommittee on Homeland Security] {{United States Senate Appropriations Subcommittees}} {{United States congressional committees}} [[Category:Subcommittees of the United States Senate|Appropriations Homeland Security]]
